item.description:
Hey, ya'll

Welcome back from the Winter Holidays. I hope you got what you wanted this year from Santa. Now it's time to have some fun Southern Style. Yee- Haaw.

We'll try to hook up around kick off time and the first round of drinks and appetizers is on me. Please call my cell if you can't find me or arriving late.

Oops, My bad Kickoff time is 4:30 pm.

Richard T.

301-515-8238 (cell)
301-525-3719 (blackberry)

divemb@yahoo.com
item.how_to_find_us: Look for me in a red Alabama Shirt or carrying a Meetup Sign.
item.name: Saints Superbowl playoff
